requirements.name: a
requirements.text: The project of reconstructing the second track of the railway line Dugo Selo – Križevci is a constituent part of the Operational programme 'Traffic' 2007 - 2013

requirements.name: b
requirements.text: Span structure of the bridge is made from steel plate girders

requirements.name: c
requirements.text: Bridge abutments are made of concrete with parallel wing walls

requirements.name: d
requirements.text: Abutments are made from concrete with small angled wing walls

requirements.name: e
requirements.text: Track thresholds are supported by two secondary longitudinal structure I-34 girders

requirements.name: f
requirements.text: The thickness of the bridge slab is from 40 cm on bearings

requirements.name: g
requirements.text: Secondary longitudinal plate girders are positioned in respective distance of 1,8 m

requirements.name: h
requirements.text: Project of reconstructing th track must be completed in entirety within four years from the day of the Beginning of Works

requirements.name: i
requirements.text: Within the performance dynamics, the priority is assigned to the subsection Vrbovec–Križevci

requirements.name: j
requirements.text: The subsection Vrbovec–Križevci has to be constructed within two years from the day of the Beginning of Works

requirements.name: k
requirements.text: The priority in performance dynamics is also assigned to roadway crossings outside the level (overpasses/underpass)

requirements.name: l
requirements.text: The roadway crossings outside the level has to be completed within three years from the day of the Beginning of Works

requirements.name: m
requirements.text: Additionally, all crossings on the specific subsection must be constructed before the elimination of the protections on railway road crossings
